skills: Account reconciliations, Results-oriented, Financial reporting, Critical thinking, Accounting operations professional, Analysis of financial systems, ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) software, Excellent facilitator
summary: Financial Accountant specializing in financial planning, reporting and analysis within the Department of Defense.
work_experience: Served as an Accountant from July 2011 to November 2012, responsible for identifying and resolving DEAMS General Ledger issues, working with teammates on various accounting processes, supporting system testing, and contributing to a tiger team that resolved General Ledger posting differences and supported $360B in accounting adjustments for fiscal year-end closes. From April 2010 to June 2011, worked as a Resource Advisor, providing financial advice, coordinating a $4.6M budget, managing timelines for budget requirements, monitoring and utilizing the Defense Travel System (DTS) and General Accounting and Finance System to manage obligations, and overseeing Government Purchase Card (GPC) programs including training and guidance development.
